member.name: TfLBBalloonStyle
member.summary: Elements of the TfLBBalloonStyle enumeration are used to specify a language bar balloon style.

member.name: TfLBBalloonStyle.TF_LB_BALLOON_RECO
member.summary: This balloon style is used to represent a reconversion operation.

member.name: TfLBBalloonStyle.TF_LB_BALLOON_SHOW
member.summary: This is a normal balloon style.

member.name: TfLBBalloonStyle.TF_LB_BALLOON_MISS
member.summary: This balloon style is used to indicate that a command was not recognized.
